mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chapter SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}, cateId = #{cateId}, memberId = #{memberId}, novelId = #{novelId};
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM chapter AS C INNER JOIN `Member` AS M ON M.id = C.memberId AND C.displayStatus = 1 WHERE C.id = #{id};
